title: Plugins
subtitle: Manage and configure system plugins
getStarted: Create your first plugin to extend the platform's capabilities

deletePlugin.title: Delete Plugin

pluginNotFound: Plugin could not be found. It may have been deleted.
noUiSchema: This plugin doesn't define a UI schema

deleteConfirmation.title: Delete Plugin
deleteConfirmation.message: Are you sure you want to delete this plugin? This action cannot be undone.
deleteConfirmation.dependencyWarning: This plugin is used by {{count}} devices. Deleting it may cause those devices to malfunction.

errors.notCompatible: Plugin is not compatible with current system
